metadata.title: CVE-2018-17237 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the function H5D__chunk_set_info_real() of H5Dchunk.c in the HDF HDF5 1.10.3 library during an attempted parse of a crafted HDF file, because of incorrect protection against division by zero. This issue is different from CVE-2018-11207.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
